bow: paid off my students loans by becoming paid surrogate note this is in the us where paid surrogacy is legal posted about this on beyondthebump as well and it generated good discussion so thought it would be worth sharing here as well apologies to anyone seeing this second time one year ago made the decision to be surrogate for lovely couple in new york to help pay off my student loans from grad school and start saving up for home single mother in my 30s with child of my own living in north carolina really wanted way to get some extra income and help someone else in the process posting this because searched reddit for posts from other women who did something like this and ca really find any so hopefully this helps few other women make the decision whether to make choice like mine overall think it one of the best decisions ve ever made it was an easy decision but it helped that the process was as hard as thought just long spent lot of time researching the various agencies and the one chose\* paid the most could find for first time surrogate the couple was matched up with is really nice got to meet them in new york city couple times when flew up there during the medical clearance process and embryo implantation my expenses were paid for too so got to visit new york for free they re both sweet and loving glad could help the poor wife has had really hard time conceiving with several heartbreaking experiences over the last several years currently 33 weeks along and ve had easy pregnancy so far so excited for them to meet their new baby in august and because the embryo was developed from the husband sperm and the wife egg the baby will be genetically theirs 100 can tell they re really excited the wife texts me all the time to see how doing and she likes to send me food she really generous on that note let me tell you some of the requirements had to meet to qualify they were that hard you should be between 21 39 years old with my agency you need bmi between 18 32 you ca be on government financial support like food stamps or other programs you need to have given birth to and be raising at least one child after paying my student loans off in full this month am putting the rest of the money towards down payment on house that money buys lot of house in my area it has all been an easy process these are the main drawbacks cons ve run into so far cons getting approved and implanted took long time months in my case there were payments for getting matched with parents and getting cleared medically but the monthly surrogacy payments did start until after the fetal heartbeat was confirmed second time there was lot of waiting worth it had to inject myself once day for about six weeks not fan of needles so the first few were tough after week got used to it and after couple of weeks it become completely routine it really not that bad lots of tests and appointments before was approved thankfully work from home translator so had the flexibility to get the testing done on their schedule for three weeks had to go to nearby fertility clinic to get blood draw 2x week once actually got pregnant it went down to just the standard pregnancy ob appointments here are the top positive aspects for me pros the couple are really nice and loving and love how able to help them with something they are so excited about got to fly to nyc couple times during the process easy pregnancy in my case know super lucky here that over in about months getting paid 50 000+ in total which covered my student loans helps me take care of my little girl and goes long way towards house here really it was one of the best decisions think ve ever made those student loans were huge burden was worried never be able to be home owner and take care of my daughter can even describe the difference it made in our lives and more importantly the difference it going to make in the lives of the couple matched with managed to get it all taken care of while helping great family finally have the child they ve wanted for years if you have any questions for me feel free to ask \*i did include any personal information here like which agency working through but if you want to know any personal details happy to discuss over pms would you do it again wow thats pretty amazing tempted but still want at least one more kid myself so ll see how feel after that thanks how is that 50 000 taxed as gift or as income or what as income think get 1099 at the end thanks for sharing am so curious about what the process has been like are you worried about being attached to the child anyway what does the emotional part feel like also are there any birth plan wishes restrictions like do the parents prefer you don get an epidural and lastly how did you explain it to your child don think surrogacy is for me but do have some questions will you deliver in nyc if so does that mean you ll be induced what was the actual implantation process like did you have to go under general are the parents expecting you to breastfeed after delivery pump breast milk kinda feel like cross posting this to latestagecapitalism not going to do that but still the system that leaves you with that much debt sucks also accept aboringdystopia removed talk to an accountant if you re getting 1099 the income it taxed much higher than w2 but you can do more with deductions an accountant will be able to look at your situation and see if forming an llc or other creative options are good fit to minimize your tax liability on this this is wonderful gift you ve given how old is your daughter have you explained to her what you re doing also just want to say think what you re doing is absolutely amazing do you know if there are any restrictions on prior sections ve had healthy and easy pregnancies with both resulting in section ve considered surrogacy when my youngest is bit older but want need another section gt you know if there are any restrictions in soviet russia any restrictions know if there are **you** this post was made by highly intelligent bot using the advanced yakov smirnoff algorithm okay thats not real algorithm learn more on my profile think this is really great you all benefited by helping each other what swell trade too am curious about whether or not she ll be breastfeeding pumping afterwards awesome could you pm me the name of the agency you used thank you sections are totally okay thank you thanks so much my daughter is and ve tried to explain it to her but don know how much she actually understands besides there baby in mommy belly thanks for the suggestion lol ll deliver locally so the intended parents will be flying down from nyc and then flying back when the baby is cleared for travel the actual implantation was shockingly fast and painless everyone said it wouldn hurt and didn believe that but it turned out to be true it was even less uncomfortable than routine pap smear no anesthesia needed at all some surrogates choose to pump and ship their milk to the parents following delivery and they are reimbursed generously for that but ve decided not to didn enjoy pumping when my own daughter was baby so didn want to put myself through that stress surrogacy is such an incredible gift would consider doing it since my pregnancy and birth were very smooth but my periods are super irregular so probably poor candidate applied to be surrogate and the woman who emailed me after applied was so super nice and said would have been great candidate however there was one discrepancy that disqualified me would have loved to help out loving couple or person while helping my own family as well good for you hope you have smooth delivery glad it worked out so well for you personally not worried about getting emotionally attached ve got my hands full with caring for my year old and with my job at the moment so wouldn be interested in adding newborn to the mix in any case haha but also not the type to get emotionally attached during pregnancy anyway apparently as learned from my first pregnancy didn feel attached to my daughter until after she was born the parents can express any preferences they might have re birth plan although the ones working with haven really but ultimately get to decide that bring on the epidural no restrictions except that my contract states that if the doctor decides section is medically necessary will consent to section told my daughter that making baby to give to someone who wants to be mommy don know how much she understands though she ll be almost years old when deliver so plan to explain it again then recommend book called it not the stork it for younger kids and explains the facts of life in no nonsense way including things like the baby and food go in different places there is chapter on how families come in all shapes and sizes and may be useful for explaining to your little also what an amazing gift you re giving and an appropriate compensation it serious commitment and deserves similar compensation to full time job sorry you weren able to qualify they can be so strict had to wait until my divorce was finalized because got disqualified when initially applied when my ex husband and were only separated oh wow that sounds like an awesome book thanks for the recommendation haven heard of irregular periods being disqualifying factor so if you are interested it wouldn hurt to try applying or just make an inquiry with an agency are you able to do this if you had section previously it seems like doctors are very hesitant to try vbac and could see why parents wouldn want their baby born via section if possible fair enough just don think particularly fertile but it doesn hurt to ask man ve considered surrogacy because do want any more kids but love being pregnant still nursing so ca do the drugs right now thought was too old but still early 30 so ve got time could you pm me the organization name ve been thinking about doing this for years are there restrictions on previous losses ve thought about doing this but ve had miscarriage nice you definitely have plenty of time still actually not sure if single miscarriage would be disqualifying factor take it you had pregnancy to term after that it would be worth inquiring about with an agency if you are interested in surrogacy have three living children my third is my rainbow baby might look into it thank you ve read your entire post and every single comment there are some great questions on here when was younger wanted to be surrogate mother now don think it would be possible had no idea how much money you could get from it you sound like wonderful person im glad you could help family considered being surrogate long time ago turns out the hyperemesis suffered with pregnancy number one is due to my genetics and ve now had hg four times the last pregnancy required 100 000 worth of expensive progesterone injections and had gestational diabetes so at this point think even using someone else egg would be no go never thought about being surrogate until after had my son had pretty easy pregnancy and actually enjoyed being pregnant knew the compensation was pretty enticing but hadn realize it was that much my husband doesn really seem on board with my doing it though so not sure how it would work just finished all of my testing to carry for friend so excited we chose clinic in new york so we re flying back and forth hoping for successful transfer in the next few months unfortunately it illegal to pay your surrogate in my state would be great way to knock out my loans and give such great gift very happy to be able to do it regardless you are not an employee it is compensation not income thank you for posting ve wanted to do this for long time but have had my first baby yet so it on the back burner it doesn sound like this would happen in your situation at all but what would happen if the parents changed their mind after you were already pregnant wish had known more about this when was single mom this would have helped me and another family out at the same time congratulations and thank you for helping family achieve their dream of having their own child you have wonderful heart you re welcome also had hoped to do this long before had my first baby good luck that amazing it so awesome of you to do that for your friend such priceless gift that too bad do you know what his reservations are thank you it crazy how expensive fertility treatments are glad your pregnancy ultimately worked out for you though god wish could do this don have kids now and even when do have health conditions so they ll probably turn me away anyways thanks for sharing your story though haha no idea mean it their baby so don think could keep her even if wanted to and they wanted me to guess she would go to relative or be adopted don know if that ever come up as to get to the point of using surrogate couple would have been trying for years and would have spent quite lot of money easily figures it wasn for fertility it was to carry pregnancy to term preterm labor was very real and painful when extended over several weeks issue are there any state limitations with the agency you went through know the state in has weird rules about surrogacy but it is something am definitely interested in what happens to your payments if you have miscarriage or stillbirth sorry for being morbid just genuinely curious how that works thank you for this ve really been considering surrogacy lately to get some extra cash not 21 yet will be soon so can apply but do have month old daughter and my pregnancy was pretty easy so think would be good candidate once 21 my only setback think is my body it sounds really selfish but don want to lose the body have didn get very big with my daughter so was mostly able to return to my normal size but worry that my next baby would be big and destroy my body do you have any thoughts about this what are some of the things that can knock you out of the running for surrogacy it kind of interesting to me how some women are very attached to the unborn child during pregnancy and some are ve heard of extreme cases on both sides was very emotionally attached to both my children from pretty early on in my pregnancies although my husband and had been trying for almost five years and had suffered several early miscarriages before the pregnancy with our son stuck so that was probably factor why have you posted this so many times thought had read this exact same story before want to get the word out because there is long wait list for intended parents and shortage of surrogates currently op hate to rain on this surrogate in va follow many surrogacy advocacy groups and surrogacy is illegal in ny state they are currently considering changing the laws but you couldn have done this in ny in the last 20 years the most common one hear about is having pregnancy complications like preeclampsia although not sure exactly which complications would be disqualifying and which wouldn other than that age or bmi being too high another factor didn think to mention in the post is that you can live in state that has laws against paid surrogacy for example new york or certain restrictive laws regarding surrogacy those states are the minority thankfully would get to keep the payments though monthly payments would stop upon miscarriage wish paid surrogacy was legal where am this sounds awesome it not certainty but getting big is risk with any pregnancy would think it would destroy your body though it could take longer to get back to your original body after the delivery that all but you ve got plenty of time to think about it unfortunately yes there are some states that agencies will avoid amp x200b https www creativefamilyconnections com us surrogacy law map https www creativefamilyconnections com us surrogacy law map amp x200b the dark green and light green states are good but the red ones are the yellow and orange ones depend on the agency think that so great of you have friend that currently pregnant with her second surrogate baby sibling to the previous one ve always wanted to be surrogate or egg donor but in my state there lot of restrictions and don qualify even though ve had successful pregnancies what will your maternity leave be like also work from home and am curious if you ll take shorter time since there no baby to care for ve thought about carrying for my best friend which agency did you use or how did you get the ball rolling no agency we went to cny fertility in new york had to get an ok from my obgyn first and physical cny handled all the medical stuff and my intended parents hired lawyer for the rest in my state my husband and have to terminate our rights to the baby and they have to adopt him her some surrogates take maternity leave but do qualify because my company requires you to be caregiver for the baby ll have to take unpaid leave and not sure how many days off ll take off if the delivery goes okay can definitely take shorter leave thanks to not having baby to care for and having job that is physically demanding she sounds amazing and that unfortunate about the restrictions in your state think he just struggles with my carrying child that wouldn end up being our own child he got really to attached to our son while was pregnant and he was super supportive and would talk to him in the womb and rub my belly often think he is thinking it would be hard to separate the fact that it someone else child that be carrying and it would hard for him to not get attached plus he thinks it be hard mentally for me too but think be able to separate the feelings gt he got really to attached to our son while was pregnant and he was super supportive and would talk to him in the womb and rub my belly often aww that so sweet he sounds like wonderful person hope you are able to talk it through with him and maybe get him on board feel free to message me if there is anything can help with too he may be interested to know that the agency work with organizes monthly support group meetings with other surrogates in your state to talk through issues like this although to be honest we mostly just use it to complain about pregnancy stuff like back pain haha hah thank you really appreciate your post and honesty here great perspective and really interesting maybe ll talk to him about it again can hurt to get more information best of luck thank you for sharing your experience don think surrogacy is for me but what you are doing is so beautiful feel so blessed when look at my month son you are giving that gift to loving and excited parents please do update us after the birth thank you will ve considered offering surrogacy for family member pretty sure would qualify my main concern is the hormones did you notice any extra mood swings menstrual issues from the shots you had to give yourself before the implementation could even take birth control in the lowest doses without major negative hormonal effects amazing love to do this but take class prescription drug took it throughout both my pregnancies without complication but would guess it still disqualifies me also have feeling my husband wouldn really be fan of the idea either thanks for sharing this it nice to hear about these things and learn more about them think this is great it shame hate being pregnant 37 weeks with and am done done done tubes tied here come whenever woman tells me she likes being pregnant always like you should be surrogate hahaha yes it definitely not for everyone hope the last couple of weeks of your pregnancy go by quickly and smoothly so many prescriptions are class it frustrating if you are really interested in pursuing surrogacy though it would hurt to contact an agency and make an inquiry to find out if your prescription would actually disqualify you did have any menstrual issues or any physical issues at all from the hormones but do think they gave me mood swings it was relief when the pregnancy progressed to the point where the doctor cleared me from having to take any more as ehmehltrue said you can do it directly without going through an agency just be sure to get lawyer to make sure your interests are protected when the contract is drawn up and hopefully your friend would cover that cost for you weird question and am not sure if you already answered but do you bounce back from pregnancy fast my daughter is almost months and barely getting back into shape btw that amazing that you did that wish could be as strong as you know couldnt go through with surrogacy our laws do allow the intended parents to pay for pregnancy related expenses so the lawyer is covered all of the expenses are covered in the legal agreement it little more complicated here because the child is legally mine and my husband regardless of his her dna or how became pregnant did with my own daughter although looking back do remember how many months it took before felt like had my pre pregnancy body back that whole period of my life is kinda blur haha sure it was more than months though so do give yourself too hard of time your body has been through lot ve heard it takes longer to bounce back from subsequent pregnancies so no idea how well ll do after this one removed this was super interesting would consider being surrogate also very similar in that do think would have an issue with emotional attachment especially if knew the baby was 100 not biologically mine but unfortunately had very tough pregnancy with my only and could do it again amp x200b think it an amazing gift though truly feel for couples suffering from infertility think the book real food in pregnancy could be helpful for you if you like to somewhat maintain your weight for most of your pregnancy used the plan in the book and my doctor approved it it is also in line with his meal plan recommendations that was given basically it suggests that you don over eat during pregnancy and tells you the best things to eat for your baby and this really allows you to maintain your weight so you won have much to lose once you deliver the biggest public hospital in my area suggests an additional 200 calories in the third trimester and no extra calories at all in the first two trimesters it based on asian bmi though so perhaps that plays part still see online articles saying you need to eat 2200 cal day or something which seems absolutely insane to me it not about 2200cal of french fries it about the
